title: 警方：造謠容易闢謠難 · 女浮屍是示威者？

replies.msg:
【造謠容易闢謠難 · 女浮屍是示威者？】

今日(2019-10-08)在海怡半島對開海面發現一具女性浮屍。網上有傳言指，該名女死者是一名在10月1日被警方拘捕的女示威者。

經查證後，警方已經確定該名被捕人士已經獲准保釋，亦已確定其人身安全，希望公眾不要胡亂相信未經證實的傳言。

Today (2019-10-08) the dead body of a female was found floating in the water outside South Horizons. Online rumours have alleged that the deceased was one of the female protestors arrested on 2019-10-01.

After investigation, the Police confirms that the female arrested person in question is currently on bail, safe and sound. Please do not believe in any ungrounded speculation.

#Factcheck
#請顧及死者家屬感受
